title: Qt5: Attempt to set a screen on a child window

content.raw:
Since we moved to Qt5, I get the following warnings when opening Gazebo:

~~~
$ gazebo --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 8.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012-2016 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 8.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012-2016 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.52
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.52
[Err] [InsertModelWidget.cc:336] Missing model.config for model "/home/louise/code/gazebo_models/.hg"
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] appmenu-qt: handleReparent 143 The given QMenuBar is already registered by appmenu-qt5, skipping(virtual void AppMenuPlatformMenuBar::handleReparent(QWindow*))
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] appmenu-qt: handleReparent 143 The given QMenuBar is already registered by appmenu-qt5, skipping(virtual void AppMenuPlatformMenuBar::handleReparent(QWindow*))
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2d2b0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2cee0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2caa0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2c5c0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2c120 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2bc40 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2b870 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2af50 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b29670 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b29b50 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b29190 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b28cf0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b28810 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2a030 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2a510 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2a9f0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2b430 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2daf0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b30470 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b30ad0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b31110 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b31aa0 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2af50 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b29190 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b28810 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:108] 0x5b2b430 void QWindowPrivate::setTopLevelScreen(QScreen*, bool) ( QScreen(0x1f73340) ): Attempt to set a screen on a child window.
